tour_packages.name: Spiritual Haridwar & Rishikesh With Mussoorie
tour_packages.transport_type: from Ex Haridwar Railway Station- vehicles are NON-AC in hills areas.
tour_packages.seller_address: 6th Floor, Tower D, Unitech Cyberpark, Sec 39, Gurgaon, Haryana 122002
includes: Customizable itineraries where you may choose transport, stay & sightseeing as per your taste & comfort

Popularly referred to as Dev Bhoomi (the land of gods), Uttarakhand since it was wedged free from Uttar Pradesh in 2000 has developed its own distinct identity, what with the regions own distinct languages, history, cultures, river valleys home to interesting micro-civilisations coming together to create a state that is not only special topographically but also unique in its heritage and spirituality. Lying to the northeast of Delhi and surrounded by Tibet and Nepal, Uttarakhand comprises the Kumaon and Garhwal regions which rise out of the sub- Himalayan plains. The snow peaks of Uttarakhand are rated among the most beautiful in the inner Himalayas, continuing in a spine that ends in Nanda Devi, the second-highest peak in the country at 25,643 foot. The dramatic terrain of the Himalayan state is defined by azure lakes, frothy rivers, glaciers that are the source of origin of some of Hinduisms holiest rivers such as Ganga, Yamuna, Mandakini and Alakananda, and frosty peaks, some of which set the backdrop for its most coveted pilgrimages. The high-altitude drives and hikes bringing you to some spectacular pilgrimages, forming the backdrop for Hindu epics.
excludes: Expenses caused by factors beyond our control like rail and flight delays, roadblocks, vehicle mal-functions, political disturbances etc.

itinerary.Day 1: Haridwar Railway Station - Haridwar (6kms/ 20 Min drive) - Upon arrival at Haridwar Railway Station driver will pick you up & drive to Haridwar Hotel reac, Check in at the hotel. In evening enjoy Holy Ganges Har Ki Pauri Ganga Aarti, overnight stay at Haridwar.
itinerary.Day 2: Haridwar local sightseeing - After Breakfast proceed for local sightseeing of Haridwar like Mansa Devi Temple & Chandi Devi, Maya Devi Temple, Shanti Kunj, Bharat Mata Mandir, etc. back to hotel overnight stay In Haridwar.
itinerary.Day 3: Haridwar - Mussoorie (88 Km/3hrs. Approx.) - After breakfast Check out from the hotel and drive towards Mussoorie en-route visit Deer Malsi Park, Mussoorie Lake, reach and check in at the hotel. Overnight stay at Mussoorie.
itinerary.Day 4: Local Sightseeing - After breakfast full day local sightseeing like Kempty fall, Company Garden, Library Chowk, Bhatta fall, and evening enjoy at Mall road, Gun Hill (by ropeway own payment), Camel backroad. Overnight stay in Mussoorie.
itinerary.Day 5: Mussoorie -Rishikesh (80km / 3hrs. Approx) - After breakfast check out from the hotel and drive towards Rishikesh. Check in at the hotel. Overnight stay in Rishikesh.
itinerary.Day 6: Rishikesh local sightseeing. - After breakfast, we do some local sightseeing like the Bharat Mandir, Laxman Jhula Bridge, Ram Jhula, Janki Jhula & Gita Bhawan (Bhagwat Geeta and other books kept for display). Evening visit the Famous Ganga Aarti ceremony at Triveni Ghat. Return to the hotel. Overnight stay at Rishikesh.
itinerary.Day 7: Rishikesh - Haridwar Railway Station (22 km /45Min. approx.) - After breakfast check out from the hotel and Drive to Haridwar, arrive and drop at Haridwar Railway Station.

terms_conditions: *Rates are not valid from 20-Dec to 6-Jan'25
*During festivals & Long Weekend price will not be valid.
*Note: Rooms are subject to availability.
If you Cancel your Holiday

You or any member of your party may cancel their travel arrangements at any time. Written notification or an e-mail to that effect from the person who made the booking must be received at our office. The cancellation charges applicable are as per the published cancellation policy below :
If we change or cancel your holiday
We do plan the arrangements in advance. It is unlikely that we will have to make any changes to your travel arrangements.
Occasionally, we may have to make changes and we reserve the right to do so at any time. If there are any changes, we will advise you of them at the earliest possible date.
We also reserve the right under any circumstances to cancel your travel arrangements by assigning reasons to you.

If we are unable to provide the booked travel arrangements due to reasons beyond our control (e.g. bad weather):We shall first try to offer alternative dates for the tour if the tour hasn't already commenced.
If the tour has already commenced, then we shall refund the booking price/fee charged to you on a pro-rata basis depending on the portion of the tour utilized by you.
In all circumstances, however, our liability shall be limited to refunding to you the price we charged as tour fees.
If you want to change your holiday plan

After confirmation of services, if you wish to change your travel arrangements in any way (e.g. your chosen departure date or accommodation), we will do our utmost to make these changes but it may not always be possible. Any request for changes must be in writing from the person who made the booking. All cost incurred due to amendment will be borne by you.
If you have a complaint

If you face any problem during your holiday, please inform the relevant supplier (e.g. your hotelier, transporter etc.) and/or our representative immediately who will endeavor to set things right. If your complaint is not resolved locally, please follow this up within 28 days of your return home by writing to us, with your booking reference and all other relevant information. However, please be advised that while we are happy to assist you in the redressal of your complaint, if any, we will be able to extend only our best efforts in managing/coordinating your complaint with the respective service provider. All third party service providers are independent contractors who are at no time under our control or supervision.
All booking vouchers and tickets will be provided 3 days before departure.

tour_packages.name: Majestic Uttarakhand With Mussoorie & Rishikesh ( Ex Delhi )
tour_packages.transport_type: from Ex Delhi- vehicles are NON-AC in hills areas.
tour_packages.seller_address: 6th Floor, Tower D, Unitech Cyberpark, Sec 39, Gurgaon, Haryana 122002
includes: Customizable itineraries where you may choose transport, stay & sightseeing as per your taste & comfort

Popularly referred to as Dev Bhoomi (the land of gods), Uttarakhand since it was wedged free from Uttar Pradesh in 2000 has developed its own distinct identity, what with the regions own distinct languages, history, cultures, river valleys home to interesting micro-civilisations coming together to create a state that is not only special topographically but also unique in its heritage and spirituality. Lying to the northeast of Delhi and surrounded by Tibet and Nepal, Uttarakhand comprises the Kumaon and Garhwal regions which rise out of the sub- Himalayan plains. The snow peaks of Uttarakhand are rated among the most beautiful in the inner Himalayas, continuing in a spine that ends in Nanda Devi, the second-highest peak in the country at 25,643 foot. The dramatic terrain of the Himalayan state is defined by azure lakes, frothy rivers, glaciers that are the source of origin of some of Hinduisms holiest rivers such as Ganga, Yamuna, Mandakini and Alakananda, and frosty peaks, some of which set the backdrop for its most coveted pilgrimages. The high-altitude drives and hikes bringing you to some spectacular pilgrimages, forming the backdrop for Hindu epics.
excludes: Expenses caused by factors beyond our control like rail and flight delays, roadblocks, vehicle mal-functions, political disturbances etc.

itinerary.Day 1: Delhi Airport - Mussoorie (310 km / 6-7 hrs. approx.) - Pick up from Delhi airport and drive towards Mussoorie reach and check in at the hotel, overnight at Mussoorie.
itinerary.Day 2: Mussoorie local sightseeing - After breakfast full day local sightseeing like Kempty fall, Company Garden, Library Chowk, Bhatta fall, and evening enjoy at Mall road (by walk) Gun Hill (by ropeway own payment), Camel Back road. Overnight stay in Mussoorie.
itinerary.Day 3: Mussoorie - Dhanaulti - Mussoorie - After breakfast full day excursion visit Dhanaulti Eco Park, later Surkanda Devi Temple (by ropeway on direct payment). Evening back to Mussoorie. Overnight stay in Mussoorie.
itinerary.Day 4: Mussoorie - Rishikesh (80km / 3hrs approx.) - After breakfast check out from the hotel and drive towards Rishikesh en-route visit Prakasheshwar Temple, Robbers cave. Reach and check in at the Hotel. Overnight stay in Rishikesh.
itinerary.Day 5: Rishikesh Local Sightseeing - After breakfast, we do some local sightseeing like, Ram Jhula Bridge, Janki Jhula & Gita Bhawan (Bhagwat Geeta and other books kept for display). Evening visit the Famous Ganga Aarti ceremony at Triveni Ghat. Return to the hotel. Overnight stay at Rishikesh.
itinerary.Day 6: Rishikesh - Haridwar - Rishikesh - After breakfast, drive to Haridwar and enjoy local sightseeing of Haridwar, Chandi Devi Temple & Mansa Devi Temple (by ropeway on direct payment), Shanti Kunj. Evening Ganga Aarti at Har Ki pauri. Later drive back to Rishikesh. Overnight hotel at Rishikesh.
itinerary.Day 7: Rishikesh - Delhi airport [255 km / 5-6 hrs] - After breakfast check out from the hotel and Drive to Delhi arrive and drop at airport on time.

Are you tired of the daily boring routine of home to office and office to home? Are you bored of the same view of your office and of the locality? Do you crave to go on a vacation so bad? And does your body and soul wants some rest and peace Worry not, for we bring you the right solution to your craving. Say "see your office""and "hello to the beauty" Book our 3 days 2 nights Mussoorie Tour Package today.
excludes: Expenses caused by factors beyond our control like rail and flight delays, roadblocks, vehicle mal-functions, political disturbances etc.

itinerary.Day 1: Delhi to Mussoorie - On arrival, you will be escorted to the hotel by the agent's representative. Once you finish all the check-in formalities at the hotel, you can spend the overnight at your freedom. You can relax and unwind at the hotel while using all the amenities available or go around the shop at Mall road or just wander enjoying the snowy weather. At the end of the day, you can come back to the hotel and get ready for the next day
itinerary.Day 2: Full Day Mussoorie City Tour - The second day will be an early start where you will begin your day with a sightseeing tour to the waterfall, Kempty Falls. After which you will be escorted back to the hotel for breakfast. After that experiencing the trek to the peak of Gun Hills and George Hill Everest and then for some fresh air our next spot will be Company Garden. Enjoy a walk on Camel's Backroad after that. Ending the evening with the most beautiful sunset at Lal Tibba hill. After the tour, you will be escorted back to the hotel for dinner.Return to hotel for overnight stay
itinerary.Day 3: Departure - Leave Mussoorie with a load full of memories After your comfortable overnight stay, an early morning Breakfast will be served for you to enjoy. Head back to your home with a heart full of memories and a soul at peace. Leave the place with a bucket full of memories and moments that you will cherish for a lifetime. Head back to your hometown after bidding adieu to the beautiful town of Mussoorie. Our representatives will make sure you end your trip on a high after escorting you to the airport/station

terms_conditions: Leave Mussoorie with a load full of memories

After your comfortable overnight stay, an early morning Breakfast will be served for you to enjoy. Head back to your home with a heart full of memories and a soul at peace. Leave the place with a bucket full of memories and moments that you will cherish for a lifetime.
Head back to your hometown after bidding adieu to the beautiful town of Mussoorie. Our representatives will make sure you end your trip on a high after escorting you to the airport/station.

tour_packages.name: Luxury Ooty Tour Package for 1 Night & 2 Days
tour_packages.hotel_address: Ramakrishna Mutt Road, Elk Hill, Ooty, Tamil Nadu 643004
tour_packages.transport_type: A/c Indica for 2 Days Sightseeing, Pickup/Drop from Coimbatore
includes: 1 Night Accommodation at Elk Hill Resort
All sightseeing and transfers as per itinerary
Pickup and drop from Coimbatore Airport / Railway Station / Bus Stand
excludes: Entrance fees to monuments, parks, etc.
Personal expenses: tips, laundry, calls, camera, insurance

itinerary.Day 1: Pickup from Bangalore or Coimbatore → Ooty. Visit Rose Garden, Ooty Lake, Doddabetta Peak, Tribal Research Center. Overnight stay at hotel.
itinerary.Day 2: Breakfast → Check-out → Optional sightseeing (Wax World, Deer Park, Avalanche Lake, Kalhatti Waterfalls, Kamraj Sagar Dam) → Drop at Coimbatore/Bangalore.

tour_packages.package_summary: Luxury Ooty tour package for 1 Night & 2 Days is perfect for a weekend getaway with a 3-star stay, dedicated cab for sightseeing, and pickup/drop from Coimbatore. Sightseeing includes major Ooty highlights.
